name: Lock Pick of Eight
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Chip of the Eight" "216381" #L "Bomb Disarmament Tools" "95576" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Chip of the Eight + Bomb Disarmament Tools = #L "Lock Pick of Eight" "216380" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Chip of the Eight can be found on Hollow Island
